question: How can I improve my public speaking skills and generate an image of a confident speaker on stage?

steps.content: How can I improve my public speaking skills and generate an image of a confident speaker on stage?
Plan: 1) Search for tips on improving public speaking skills. 2) Generate an image of a confident speaker on stage. 3) Return the answer.
Searching for tips on improving public speaking skills.

To improve public speaking skills: 1) Practice regularly in front of a mirror or with friends. 2) Record and review your speeches. 3) Join a public speaking club like Toastmasters. 4) Focus on clear articulation and pacing. 5) Use body language effectively.
Generating an image of a confident speaker on stage.
Image of a confident speaker on stage generated.
Can you suggest any online courses for public speaking?
Plan: 1) Search for online courses on public speaking. 2) Return the answer.
Searching for online courses on public speaking.
Recommended online courses: 1) 'Introduction to Public Speaking' on Coursera. 2) 'Public Speaking Mastery' on Udemy. 3) 'Dynamic Public Speaking' on edX.
